The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[6 January|6]]''' - A new edition of ''[[The Monsters and the Critics]]'' is published.
==March==
* '''[[20 March|20]]''' - Translator [[Britt G. Hallqvist]] dies.
==April==
* '''[[25 April|25]]''' - ''[[Tyalie Tyelellieva]]'' issue 10 is published.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 38]] is published.
==May==
* '''[[9 May|9]]-[[11 May|11]]''' - [[Bree Moot 3]].
==July==
* '''[[23 July|23]]''' - ''[[Tyalie Tyelellieva]]'' issue 11 is published.
==August==
* '''[[1 August|1]]''' - The German Tolkien Society [[Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft e.V.]] is founded.
* '''[[8 August|8]]-[[11 August|11]]''' - [[Mythcon 28]].
* '''[[18 August|18]]''' - The audiobook ''[[Pearl and Sir Orfeo (audiobook)|Pearl and Sir Orfeo]]'' by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], read by Terry Jones, is published.
* '''?''' - Production begins for ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)]]''.

==September==
* '''[[19 September|19]]-[[21 September|21]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1997]].
* '''[[30 September|30]]''' - The album ''[[An Evening in Rivendell]]'' is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Hobbit]]'' [[Audiobooks|audiobook]] topped the bestseller list for audiobooks for children.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 35|''Mallorn'' 35]] is published.

==October==
* '''[[20 October|20]]''' - Actor [[John Bell]] is born.
* '''[[24 October|24]]''' - [[Don Messick]], who voiced [[Balin]] and the [[Gwaihir|Lord of the Eagles]] in [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]], dies.

==November==
* '''[[13 November|13]]''' - [[Peter Jackson]] sends a parcel containing [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0116344/ "Forgotten Silver"] and [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0110005/  "Heavenly Creatures"], and a letter explaining [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|an upcoming movie project]] to [[Alan Lee]]. 
* '''[[13 November|13]]''' - [[The Brazilian Tolkien Society]] is founded.
==December==
* '''[[14 December|14]]''' - [[Owen Barfield]], [[Inklings|Inkling]], dies.
==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[Tales from the Perilous Realm]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[A Question of Time]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[News from the Shire and Beyond - Studies on Tolkien]]'', the first book of the [[Cormarë Series]], is published.
* '''?''' - [[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|''The Hobbit'' (1968 radio series)]] is released on CD.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Hobbit Companion]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - Artist [[Maret Kernumees]] dies.
* '''?''' - The [[Middle-earth Puzzles]] are released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Middle-earth: The Lidless Eye]]'' card game is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Middle-earth: Against the Shadow]]'' card game is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Middle-earth: The White Hand]]'' card game is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Hands of the Healer]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Tolkien's Hobbit|Tolkien's Hobbit: A Book of 20 Postcards]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Tolkien Calendar 1998]] is released.
